title: Daily Personalized Air & Pollen Health Alerts with Ambee API and AI via Email
author: Ange Russell

You'll receive two things:
1ï¸âƒ£ Real-time environmental data (air quality and pollen levels)  
2ï¸âƒ£ A short user profile (to help tailor your suggestions)

<environmental_data>
ğŸŒ *Location:*

â€¢ City: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].city }}  
â€¢ Lat/Lng: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].lat }}, {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].lng }}

ğŸ’¨ *Air Quality:*  
â€¢ PM2.5: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].PM25 }} Âµg/mÂ³  
â€¢ AQI: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].AQI }}  
â€¢ Main pollutant: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].aqiInfo.pollutant }}  
â€¢ Level: {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].aqiInfo.category }}

ğŸŒ¸ *Pollen Levels:*  
â€¢ Tree pollen: {{ $json.data[0].Count.tree_pollen }} ({{ $json.data[0].Risk.tree_pollen }})  
â€¢ Grass pollen: {{ $json.data[0].Count.grass_pollen }} ({{ $json.data[0].Risk.grass_pollen }})  
â€¢ Weed pollen: {{ $json.data[0].Count.weed_pollen }} ({{ $json.data[0].Risk.weed_pollen }})
</environmental_data>

---

ğŸ‘§ And hereâ€™s the person youâ€™re helping today:
<user_profile>   
â€¢ Age:  {{ $('Set User Profile').item.json['Age '] }} 
â€¢ Health Sensitivity: {{ $('Set User Profile').item.json['Health sensitivities'] }}
</user_profile>

---

ğŸ’¡ What to do:

1. ğŸ“ **Write a friendly summary**  
Explain the overall environmental situation today in 2â€“3 warm, simple sentences.  
Be sure to:
- Mention if itâ€™s generally a good or sensitive day to be outdoors.
- Highlight anything unusually high (e.g., "Tree pollen is very high today" or "Air quality is moderate").
- **Include the actual environmental values** (like pollen risk levels: grass_pollen = {{ $json.data[0].Risk.grass_pollen }}, tree_pollen = ..., and AQI = {{ $('Get Air data').item.json.stations[0].AQI }}) clearly in your response.  
Make the summary sound supportive and easy to understand, like talking to a friend or parent.

2. ğŸŒŸ **Give 3 to 5 helpful suggestions**  
Think like someone who really cares.  
Keep them practical, gentle, and specific to the user.  
Examples: stay indoors, wear a mask, take medication, keep windows closed, use a purifier etc.....

---

ğŸ“¦ Format your response like this (with emojis and clarity!) of course ignore

3. Use the Mail Tool to send the message by email
âœ¨ Stay warm, helpful, and comforting.  
Everything you say should feel like advice from someone who truly cares.

Ambee offers free API access, but you need to sign up using a work or university email address (e.g., name@company.com, name@uni.edu). Personal emails like Gmail or Outlook won't be accepted.

Steps to get your key:

1.Go to https://www.getambee.com

2.Click â€œTry API for Freeâ€

3.Use your organization or school email when signing up

4.Confirm your email and copy the key from your dashboard

5.Paste it into the HTTP Request node headers:

x-api-key: YOUR_KEY_HERE
 Tip: If youâ€™re a student, your university email usually works just fine.

"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"91f908f7-71e6-49f6-84f7-0fe00328c5e3","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-180,220],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":480,"height":300,"content":"## Set Your Location Coordinates

readme:
This workflow fetches real-time air quality and pollen data using Ambeeâ€™s APIs and sends a friendly, personalized daily summary by email. It uses a scheduler to automate data collection, AI-generated health tips, and clear, actionable messagesâ€”perfect for sensitive users (e.g. kids with asthma, allergy sufferers).

**Use Case** :  
Ideal for individuals with respiratory conditions, allergies, or those who want to stay informed about environmental conditions affecting their health.â€‹

**Set up steps**  
Estimated time: 10â€“15 minutes  
You'll need:

  * Ambee API key (free registration)
  * OpenAI API key
  * Email credentials (Gmail)
  * User Profile



ğŸ’¡ Keep in mind:

Youâ€™ll need to input your location coordinates (weâ€™ve pre-filled Braunschweig as an example).

The AI Agent node uses a ready-made prompt thatâ€™s tailored for emailâ€”but feel free to adapt it to other messaging platforms.
